params.deployer: Address of the initiator of the deployment

params.remoteToken: Address of the token on the remote domain.

params._bridge: Address of the ERC721 bridge on this network.

params._remoteToken: Address of the corresponding token on the other domain.

returns._0: Semver contract version as a string.
